action.action-desc: Mr. Stockman introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to require annual reports from agencies detailing the cost of multilingual services, to end speculation about the cost of multilingual services provided by the Federal Government, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Report the Costs Act.

section.header: Report on cost of multilingual services

subsection.text: Chapter 9 of title 31, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking and at the end of subparagraph (D);
by redesignating subparagraph (E) as subparagraph (F); and
by inserting after subparagraph (D) the following:
a report detailing the annual cost of multilingual services, described by section 904, in accordance with guidance issued under section 3517; and

paragraph.text: by adding at the end the following:

section.text: In this chapter, the term cost of multilingual services means the costs to the agency associated with—

paragraph.text: helping agency employees or contractors learn a language other than English;
preparing or producing agency materials in a language other than English;
compensating an employee or a contractor for the ability of the employee or contractor to speak a language other than English; and
any other services provided or performed by an agency in a language other than English that incur additional cost to the agency.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section apply with respect to any reports prepared under section 902(a)(6) of title 31, United States Code, for a fiscal year beginning on or after October 1, 2016.
The table of sections at the beginning of chapter 9 of title 31, United States Code, is amended by inserting after the item relating to section 903 the following:
Subchapter II of chapter 35 of title 31, United States Code is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking and at the end of subparagraph (E);
by redesignating subparagraph (F) as subparagraph (G); and
by inserting after subparagraph (E) the following:
a Multilingual Services Expense Report that includes—

clause.text: a summary and analysis of the cost of multilingual services (as described in section 904) detailed in reports prepared under section 902(a)(6)(E);
a description of any changes needed to report accurately the cost of multilingual services for each agency; and
any other information the Director considers appropriate to fully inform the Congress of the costs of all multilingual services provided by the Federal Government; and

paragraph.text: by adding at the end the following:

section.text: The Director of the Office of Management and Budget shall issue guidance that each agency Chief Financial Officer shall follow in compiling a report required under section 902(a)(6)(E) on the cost of multilingual services.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section apply to any reports prepared under title 3512(a) of title 31, United States Code, for a fiscal year beginning on or after October 1, 2016.

Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Director of the Office of Management and Budget shall issue guidance under section 3517 of title 31, United States Code, as added by subsection (a).
